column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////So glad I happened to find this place. The ramen is so delicious! First things first...the dumplings. Oh so good! Very tender and flavorful. Put a little gyoza sauce on it and that is almost a meal in itself. But it can't be
column2: because there is still ramen to eat. The broth was so delicious and addictive
column3: and the chicken breast was super tender. Don't get scared and choose mild. I think you will miss out on the amazing flavor if you don't go with spicy.
